EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Istanbul. Event: Honeywell Operators Conference
Date: April 24, 2018
Location: Sheraton Istanbul Atakoy Hotel, Sahilyolu Cad, Atakoy, 34158, Istanbul
Please contact us at Jiri.Huml@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jiri.Huml@Honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
